game.name: DCS: F-16C Last Out Weasels over Syria II Campaign by Ground Pounder Simulations
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: Rejoin Captain Dan ‘Forrest’ Wilson as he returns to the air to fight for supremacy over the Syrian skies in Last Out - Weasels Over Syria II.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rejoin Captain Dan ‘Forrest’ Wilson as he returns to the air to fight for supremacy over the Syrian skies in Last Out - Weasels Over Syria II.
game.developers: Eagle Dynamics SA, Ground Pounder Simulations
